author: Football Italia staff
title: Godin returned to Uruguay
description: Inter defender Diego Godin and seven other Nerazzurri players were given the green light to leave Italy after finishing their quarantine period.  	The Uruguayan defender has returned to South America after serving the initial quarantine in Milan and sent a me…
content:
